title: Cross-Validation Techniques with Scikit-Learn
description: Cross-validation is a technique for evaluating machine learning models by training several models on different subsets of the available data and evaluating them on the complementary subset. This helps to avoid overfitting and ensures that the model is generalizable. In this tutorial, we will use scikit-learn to explore different cross-validation techniques and their behavior.

meta.title: Cross-Validation Techniques | Machine Learning Tutorial
meta.description: Learn cross-validation techniques for evaluating machine learning models and avoiding overfitting with scikit-learn in this comprehensive tutorial.
meta.keywords: cross-validation, machine learning, scikit-learn, data visualization, model evaluation

i18n.title: 使用Scikit-Learn的交叉验证技术
i18n.description: 交叉验证是一种评估机器学习模型的技术，通过在可用数据的不同子集上训练多个模型，并在互补子集上对其进行评估。这有助于避免过拟合，并确保模型具有泛化能力。在本教程中，我们将使用Scikit-Learn探索不同的交叉验证技术及其行为。
